title: Fritz Schmid (football manager)
text:
Fritz Schmid (born 10 September 1959) is a Swiss <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach who was last the manager of the <a href="New%20Zealand%20national%20football%20team">New Zealand national football team</a>.
He spent seven years as the assistant manager of <a href="FC%20Basel">FC Basel</a> under head coach <a href="Christian%20Gross">Christian Gross</a>, a period in which the club won the <a href="Swiss%20Cup">Swiss Cup</a> four times and qualified for the <a href="UEFA%20Champions%20League">UEFA Champions League</a> twice.
